description: Implemented auto-generated .julieignore feature for vendor code detection. System analyzes project structure on first run, detects vendor patterns (libs/, plugin/, jquery/bootstrap files, minified directories), and generates self-documenting .julieignore automatically. Solves vendor code pollution problem in legacy apps with zero user friction. Added DirectoryStats tracking, analyze_vendor_patterns() with 3 confidence levels, comprehensive .julieignore template with usage docs, and modified discovery.rs to auto-generate before indexing. Documented as Bonus Phase in JULIE_2_PLAN.md. Compiles cleanly, ready for SurgeryScheduling workspace testing.
